_meanings:
{@--1@} To be named, 
mentioned, expressed &c.; {#vAgeva me#} 
{#nABiDeyavizayamavatarati trapayA#} <ls>K. 151</ls> words
refuse, through shame, to express
what I have to say.

{@--2@} Nameable,
as a category or predicament (in
logic); {#aBiDeyAH padArTAH, aBiDeyatvaM#} 
{#padArTasAmAnyalakzaRaM#}.
